Reviews.Title: Great Laptop for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Screenname808
Reviews.Content: Purchased the HP 1261NR on sale at Office Depot for $438 w/tax. Excellent deal. The bright screen display and size for the price is amazing! The webcam is crystal clear and makes me look good, which is important (right?). The sleek grey shell design is durable, good looking and easy to transport. At 6 lbs. someone did their design homework because it's extremely nice to carry. The laptop stays cool to the touch while in use. Loud Altec speakers in the front provide quality sound. I'm impressed with the design team at HP. Good job people.In my opinion, if you get this laptop for under $600 w/tax, pat yourself on the back. 500 gig hd and 6 gigs of memory is sufficient for most users. Personally, I enjoy the SD slot, makes the transfer of files a breeze. Pop the SD card into the slot and bam! there's instant access to media. Awesome. BTW, Windows 7 is easy to use and is pretty much the same as XP (don't stress you'll laugh; 7 is very easy to use). Love that the laptop looks expensive but not super expensive. Perfectly "blending" (not too expensive, not too cheap) laptop for any pc environment.The blue ray dvd player is great (little loud when playing) but for the price, noise is expected. The springboard to the keyboard is a little sticky. This too is something that is to be expected with price. Simple solution and cool; upgrade to the Microsoft wireless keyboard I reviewed. Touche.Grab that $500 you've saved since reading my review on dumping AT&T.; (Yes, I bought this lappy with the $ I saved dumping them). Be patient and search for this on sale. Order. Enjoy your new laptop which didn't empty your wallet.Update: Used for over a month and still love this laptop. Connected a really old printer and the laptop downloaded the driver before I knew it! One of the best purchases I've made this year and worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Rock Solid Laptop - Great PRice
Reviews.Author: N. Flake "US Patriot"
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these for Graduation gifts for my kids.  I was threatening to take one of these for my own.  Super fast, huge bright screen, and a built in Blue ray.  You really can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: 4 Months of Use Good Solid Laptop
Reviews.Author: Nancy J. Boyle "Nancy J. Boyle"
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop at the beginning of July (2012). It is now almost the beginning of December (2012)and after 5 months of using this laptop almost 5 months I now feel that I can review it fairly. I read one of the reviews stated that you could not control contrast, but 2 keys and 3 keys from the escape button on the top left is a small beam and a large beam icon on each which changes the look of the display and perhaps the reviewer just needed to adjust the display. Other reviewers wrote about the battery life.I usually have mine plugged in because I have a terrific laptop table that I keep by my chair and once in a while I unplug to let the battery drain down. I AM really glad I waited to write my review, because I live in New Jersey and we lost our power for 2 full weeks and didn't have a whole lot of gas in the car, so we pretty much stayed home. Since we do have a Starbucks (internet hotspot) about a mile away,I was able to spend some time on the computer and fully charge the battery. On the other days I could go and play some already downloaded games (without electric, our home internet router would not work)in between reading my Kindles. Over the course of two weeks I did this several times. I believe that the battery lasted close to 3 hours, which is reasonable for this size laptop (17.3"). I do not feel that this unit is "delicate" (translation:cheap feeling) as one reviewer thought. I have an HP All-in-One wireless printer system. This laptop set it up automatically ready to use. I didn't have to do anything. I  make my own greeting cards it works great with that program. I like to play games and they play without any glitches. The display is clear and bright, I've never had to adjust it. In all, it is a good computer especially for the price (although I DID pay quite a bit less for mine at the time through Amazon!). The 500GB hard drive is good (up from the 350 GB on my old laptop) and I also have an external hard drive to store pictures. I would recommend this to most average laptop users.

Reviews.Title: Not bad but needs improvement
Reviews.Author: Rainbow
Reviews.Content: This product is ok, not great! The webcam is crystal clear, the keys are easy to use, the screen is awesome and the appearance is great. However, the touch pad is somewhat stubborn at times. I have only been using this for three days and i am second guessing my purchase. The battery last for 1hour and that sucks, its like its an old battery. The computer also feels very delicate and as such, you have to treat it like an egg. Its a good computer but i think without good battery life and reliable touch pad, its just half way there.

Reviews.Title: 2 things are horribly wrong
Reviews.Author: Duramax
Reviews.Content: Right out of the box, the left mouse button was broken. It sticks easily and the spring is either worn out or completely ruined. It barely clicks. Compared to the right click, using the mouse is such a struggle I'd rather use the touch pad to click...Secondly, the display driver fails catastrophically every 2 minutes or so. I have tried for months now with updating my windows updates and making sure the drivers are current and asking online how to stop this from happening with no solution in sight.If I could, which I don't think I can now that I've owned the laptop for a few months now, I would return it and do it all again and buy a mac or a different brand. This laptop is terrible and I'm sad that a refurbished product passed inspection in this horrible condition which says how much the seller really looks into a laptop before selling it.

Reviews.Title: Slow.
Reviews.Author: BAshton
Reviews.Content: I researched many laptops to find the one that would meet my needs (day to day internet use, youtube video watching and netflix use, nothing big nothing more) and I came accross this one. I bought this laptop brand new and it ran very slow. At first, I thought it just needed to warm up, but it is still very slow and often times freezes, this is the second HP laptop I've bought but the first to be unsatisfactory. Thumbs down!

Reviews.Title: PERFECT FOR ME!
Reviews.Author: Diane
Reviews.Content: Because of my lack of education about Windows 8, I returned it for this model which is Windows 7, and have no regrets!Love the keyboard alone!It's very easy to set up (I did it in no time), great resolution, great speed and a nice clean look, and light to carry around.Upon receiving this model, the necessary programs and anti-virus was already installed, along with other fun and convenient games and programs.I would definitely purchase the same model if need for family or a gift.very impressed!

Reviews.Title: HP Pavilion G7-1261NR 17.3" Laptop
Reviews.Author: Becky
Reviews.Content: Should have read more about the programs that came with the computer overall it has not been a bad computer.

Reviews.Title: HP Pavilion G7 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Charles
Reviews.Content: Works great.  I use for mapping and graphics and it handles everything.  Would recommend.  Used it for 6 months and have had NO problems.

Reviews.Title: Lots of power and capacity.
Reviews.Author: azjoy
Reviews.Content: Its got some quirks that need to be worked out or at least learn to live with.  I'm pretty sure the price was low because it is very large and heavy and they quit making them this large.  I want a thin laptop or ipad next.

Reviews.Title: This is a Fast Computer
Reviews.Author: Kitt Schilke
Reviews.Content: I have been using this computer for a year and it has given me wonderful service.  I like the large screen.  I am hard on keyboards and this one has held up well.

Reviews.Title: DOA
Reviews.Author: Scott Grodberg
Reviews.Content: Vertical scanlines in display. Local repair shop has tried replacing cables and the display and says needs new motherboard. Doesn't say much for the product, but even less for Ocean Reef Electronics who solid it as Refurbished. Lies! I've wasted enough time on this. Moving forward with a new product directly from manufacturer, no marketplace this time, thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: HP Pavillion Lapton
Reviews.Author: Kathleen A. Buckalew
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this computer.  It does everything I wanted it to do.  It plays Bluray movies and at a very reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop, large screen
Reviews.Author: ART
Reviews.Content: When I bought this a while back I wanted a large screen and it sure was, although I was not the best with computers it sure looked like it, having a laptop with a big screen while others had the smaller type.

Reviews.Title: HP 1261NR Laptop 6gb Ram 500gb HD DVD/Blu-Ray
Reviews.Author: O. Edwards
Reviews.Content: Great laptop for the price. 17.3" display, DVD burner & Blu-Ray player are awesome. This laptop meets all my needs for everyday use!

Reviews.Title: Great PC
Reviews.Author: Robert Johnson "BJ"
Reviews.Content: This PC has proven to fit the bill for us as it has a very large screen and Windows 7 which meets most all of our needs. For the price, a true bargain.

Reviews.Title: Computor
Reviews.Author: Jace
Reviews.Content: I like it so far but need to learn more about computers so I can say more on this oteam

Reviews.Title: Poor packaging!!!
Reviews.Author: asgyan01
Reviews.Content: Was very excited upon receiving this package. Everything looked new at first glance, however, when i opened the screen, i realized that it was "cracked". Afterwards, i realised that it was due to poor packaging on the part of the supplier. I returned it for a full refund (since apparently, it could not be exchanged for another one), but i have to say that the return process was fairly simple\easy, with no hassles and the service was excellent. Bottom line, order at  your own risk.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: James D. Cain "JD"
Reviews.Content: The screen on the HP Pavilion was already cracked when it was delivered.  The merchandise came damaged and defective, and I have spent fruitless hours on the phone and on email with HP and Amazon and Cyberwarehouse II (the dreadful vendor that Amazon uses for its computers) to try and get the computer repaired or replaced or my money refunded.  My claims have initially been denied by all parties.  They want me to pay for a new screen myself since it is not covered by warranty.  The poor rating I gave the HP Pavilion is not for the item itself (I really can't evaluate it since I haven't been able to use it, though one might imagine that the screens might stand up better to whatever gorillas are doing fulfillment at Cyberwarehouse II), but it is for the truly terrible service from Amazon, Cyberwarehouse II, and HP.  I'd warn everyone never to buy computers or other expensive items from Amazon since their customer service is so awful.

Reviews.Title: Solid performer
Reviews.Author: xilarf
Reviews.Content: Well made machine, has run reliably since the first power-on.  HP seems to provide features at a lower price point than Dell but the quality seems as good if not better.  I downloaded Chrome, deleted IE, deleted the trialware A/V and Office replaced by Avast and open-office and ZoneAlarm.  Have not had any problems or issues with the machine to date.

Reviews.Title: Freezes constantly
Reviews.Author: VaedaSynapse
Reviews.Content: I got a g7 for my work about 6 months ago. It was the best laptop value I'd ever experienced, so I wanted to get one for myself. This one has the same amount of ram, the only differences were the vid card and the processor. But I had this one out of the box for three hours ONLY THREE HOURS and it froze 5 times (once after using the restore partition to install the OS to factory state).I'm spooked. I'm to worried that this could be a sign of a systemic design problem OR a problematic component. I don't have the time to mess with that. I'm returning it and going to get a variant from somewhere else, somewhere where I don't have to go through the cost and hassle of sending a laptop back because it's defective out of the box.

Reviews.Title: teruble
Reviews.Author: G.A.ELsamarayi
Reviews.Content: first when I got it slow supper slow so I scan it full scan and did not help after I install the soft wear and my files it got even worst so reboot to the manefacuring orignal and did the same thing .

Reviews.Title: MUY BUENA COMPUTADORA POR PRECIO
Reviews.Author: RAFAEL MARRERO
Reviews.Content: LA LAPTOP ES MAS DE LO QUE ESPERABA.  TODOS SUS FEATURES EXCEDEN LO QUE YO ESPERABA. MUY BUENA VELOCIDAD, CAMARA, AUDIO Y GRAFICAS

Reviews.Title: Never buy if your an artist, you watch videos or do anything you want to see
Reviews.Author: Business Developer
Reviews.Content: There is no control for contrast on this thing so there are two settings murky mud and invisible.This is so annoying, I'm returning it.
